name: Five by Five
description:
Five by Five
Five by Five is a 64x64 , grid based, endless shooter. The higher level you reach, the more enemies will spawn. Each level is made up of 4 waves of enemies. At the end of every wave, 3 pegs will explode.  You'll have to adapt to your new surroundings quickly to dodge approaching enemies.

Controls:
WASD or Arrow Keys = Move
Left Mouse = Fire

Credit:
Game by Ghost
Music by Xyban (SoundCloud) (Twitch)
